turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to grab a coffee at Peets

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Peets would you like to order from.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on E. Bidwell in Folsom

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like to order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A large iced latte please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay that will be $4.75

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no, just the coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been place for a large iced latte at Peets on E. Bidwell in Folsom

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long before its ready

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great I will head on over.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, is there anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you charge to my account

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been charged to you Peet's account

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You order will be sent via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, can you send it to my email address also.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been sent to your email.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you.
